company.name: VNpay
company.description:
Vietnam Payment Solution Joint Stock Company (VNPAY), was founded in 2007, is a top leading company in the field of Electronic Payment in Vietnam.
With its core business areas in the sectors of Finance - Banking, Information Technology - Telecommunications, VNPAY provides its services to more than 40 banks in Vietnam, 5 Telcos & over 200 e-commerce enterprises, offering various simple and convenient payment solutions.
